chart_description: This chart provides an overview of the condition of Kubernetes pods in terms of their readiness, initialization, scheduling, and container status.

dimension_descriptions.containers_ready: Displays the number of containers that have passed their readiness probe.
dimension_descriptions.pod_initialized: Displays whether a pod has been initialized successfully.
dimension_descriptions.pod_ready: Displays whether the pod is ready to start accepting traffic.
dimension_descriptions.pod_scheduled: Displays whether the pod has been scheduled to run on a Kubernetes node.
